home.subtitle: Your host assistant for a professional mafia game

rolesAssignment.title: Roles assignment
rolesAssignment.subtitle: Please, hand out the roles to the players while keeping the fields below in accordance with the roles selected.

firstNight.title: Night
firstNight.mafiaSubtitle: Please, wake up the mafia (MAFIA_PLAYERS). They have a minute to negotiate.
firstNight.sheriffSubtitle: Please, wake up the sheriff (SHERIFF_NAME). The sheriff has 30 seconds to take a look at the table.

day.title: Day
day.speechSubtitle: Give PLAYER_NAME a minute to speak.
day.mutedPlayerSubtitle: Please, let PLAYER_NAME nominate a player for voting. The player is muted for this round.
day.testamentSubtitle: PLAYER_NAME has a minute for a testament.
day.defenceSpeechSubtitle: PLAYER_NAME has 30 seconds for a defence speech.

voting.subtitle: Please, mark all those in favor of voting player PLAYER_NAME off.
voting.eliminateAllSubtitle: Please, mark all those in favor of voting all players off.

night.title: Night
night.mafiaSubtitle: Please, mark the fields below in accordiance with the mafia decisions.
night.donSubtitle: Please, wake the player PLAYER_NAME up and let him check for a sheriff.
night.deadDonSubtitle: Even though the Don is dead, please pretend to wake him up.
night.sheriffSubtitle: Please, wake the player PLAYER_NAME up and let him check for mafia.
night.deadSheriffSubtitle: Even though the Sheriff is dead, please pretend to wake him up.
night.bestGuessSubtitle: Please, let player PLAYER_NAME make his best guess.

results.title: The Game Has Finished!
results.info: Don was player DON_NAME, mafia - MAFIA_NAMES, sheriff - player SHERIFF_NAME.
